description: Tusculum was a Latin city of the Alban Hills in central Italy. After 381 B.C., Tusculum became the first "municipium cum suffragio".

properties.description: Representative point location for the ancient Latin town of Tusculum, verified in Google Earth. Location was digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 18975
